Angular Terminology Cheat Sheet
Sets a property on an HTML element.  Everything in the double quotes is code!  Can access any property/method from our component class instance
Sets up an event handler on an HTML element.  Everything in the double quotes is code!  Can call any method on the component class instance.
Prints out information in a template.  Can access any property/method from our component class instance
Changes the structure of HTML in our template.  Some structural directives are given to us by Angular, but we can also create our own
